      • calculateOverallFitness

        public double calculateOverallFitness()
                               throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
        Calculates the overall fitness of an ant's route The weight of each edge added together
        Returns:
        double - The fitness of this ant's solution
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidParameterException - - If a city in the tour memory doesn't have a edge between it and the current city

      • checkIfVisited

        public boolean checkIfVisited(Edge e)
        Checks to see if a city has already been visited
        Parameters:
        e - - Edge - The edge being explored
        Returns:
        boolean - Whether or not a city has been visited before

      • decidePath

        public Edge decidePath(java.util.ArrayList<Edge> edges,
                       double pheromoneWeight,
                       double weightWeight)
        This determines out of the possible paths, which one an ant should take This does it by using the equation: weight * beta / pheromone *alpha We are trying to maximise the pheromone while minimising the weight (or cost) of a path
        Parameters:
        edges - - ArrayList - All the possible edges for an ant to go down
        pheromoneWeight - - The alpha value, how much the pheromone value should be taken into account
        weightWeight - - The beta value, how much the weight of an edge should be taken into account
        Returns:
        Edge - The best Edge out of the list

      • returnJourney

        public void returnJourney()
        This calculates the return edge of the journey. Split out to make the code more legible

      • calculatePath

        public void calculatePath(java.util.ArrayList<City> allCities,
                          double alpha,
                          double beta)
        This calculates the path an ant takes
        Parameters:
        allCities - - All the possible cities in the graph
        alpha - - How much the pheromone value impacts the path chosen
        beta - - How much the weight of an edge impacts the path chosen

      • increasePheromoneOnPath

        public void increasePheromoneOnPath(double d)
        This increases the pheromone value on the edges used
        Parameters:
        d - - the increase rate of pheromone

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        The toString method - displays the current city and overall path fitness

        Returns:
        String - The String representation

      • printEdgePath

        public java.lang.String printEdgePath()
        This prints the path of an ant with the weights in between each node. This helps for verification of correct fitness evaluation.
        Returns:
        String - Concatenated list of cities + variables
